rows.label: bf09280100_0010
rows.name: ...So he still has that power.

rows.label: bf09280100_0012
rows.name: Then we'll use ours as well!

rows.label: bf09280100_0020
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hmph!

rows.label: bf09280100_0030
rows.name: I won't let you freeze me!

rows.label: bf09280100_0040
rows.name:
The power to make your
thoughts reality...

rows.label: bf09280100_0050
rows.name: How magnificent.

rows.label: bf09280100_0060
rows.name:
Why use that power given to
you by God, to help humans?

rows.label: bf09280100_0070
rows.name: To go to Eden.

rows.label: bf09280100_0080
rows.name: And what will you do once you go there?

rows.label: bf09280100_0090
rows.name: Will you open it to people?

rows.label: bf09280100_0095
rows.name: Will you share it?

rows.label: bf09280100_0100
rows.name: Don't ask the obvious.

rows.label: bf09280100_0110
rows.name: And what will you do after giving it?

rows.label: bf09280100_0115
rows.name: Can't you see what will happen?!

rows.label: bf09280100_0120
rows.name: What result?!

rows.label: bf09280100_0130
rows.name:
Humans will turn Eden
into another Mors...

rows.label: bf09280100_0135
rows.name:
Just as they did with
Iira 500 years ago.

rows.label: bf09280100_0140
rows.name: I won't let that happen!

rows.label: bf09280100_0150
rows.name: What will happen after you die?

rows.label: bf09280100_0155
rows.name: Who will stop it?

rows.label: bf09280100_0160
rows.name: That's why...

rows.label: bf09280100_0170
rows.name: Isn't that exactly why you Blades exist?

rows.label: bf09280100_0180
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]?!

rows.label: bf09280100_0190
rows.name:
And the one who will accomplish
that with you is not me.

rows.label: bf09280100_0195
rows.name: It will be someone else.

rows.label: bf09280100_0200
rows.name:
That's right. When humans die,
that's the end for them.

rows.label: bf09280100_0210
rows.name:
But their thoughts and memories will
always be carried on by someone else.

rows.label: bf09280100_0220
rows.name: It's the same for you Blades, isn't it?

rows.label: bf09280100_0230
rows.name:
Inheriting your previous self along with
someone else, becoming a new self.

rows.label: bf09280100_0240
rows.name:
That's how you've lived
until now, right?

rows.label: bf09280100_0250
rows.name: Then, aren't we the same?

rows.label: bf09280100_0260
rows.name: From now on, I'll be by your side...

rows.label: bf09280100_0270
rows.name: I'll protect you...
